name: Pharaoh's Pyramid
description:
The pharaoh has commanded that you will construct him a new pyramid. Can you construct it before time runs out? Or will you anger the pharaoh and be sentenced to death? There's only one way to find out...

IMPORTANT: Windows users, if the sound does not work, please try the other Windows version.

Visit my website: http://www.actuallyeverything.com/

Twitter: @notactuallycam

Original music composed by: @crossmark
